short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to support other document IDs in RavenDB studio to be recognized as links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RavenDB Studio only supports parsing of document links in the form  '[collection]/[number]-[nodename]' (forward slash separation).
This extension extends the pattern to the form '[collection]-[number]-[nodename]' (dash and forward slash).
When a document is edited, a listener is observing the displayed part of the document for links and injects them as HTML link on the page (see screenshot).
